sentence.Network_en: The concessions did little to placate the students.
sentence.Network_cn: 让步根本未能平息学生的愤怒。

sentence.Network_en: Even a written apology failed to placate the indignant hostess.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至一纸书面道歉都没能安抚这个怒气冲冲的女主人.

sentence.Network_en: He never attempts to placate his enemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从不企图与敌人和解.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 循字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 步行〖 walk〗 安抚〖 placate〗 通“揗”。抚慰;摩;抚摩〖 finger〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... depict v 描述，描绘 placate v 安慰，抚慰 placid a 平静的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... exacerbate 加重，恶化 placate 抚慰，平息(愤怒) vacate 空出.
新东方教育科技集团 > 新东方 > 详细信息 ... Jeopardize 危及，危害 Placate 安抚，使和解 Corroborate 使巩固，确证.

list.abs: she hardly knew how to answer this , and yet her wrath was not placated .她几乎不知道该如何来回答他，然而她的怒气并没有气息。
the understanding anal application of material is very important when placating rooms , decorating houses and buildings with high art level .在厅室布置、住宅装饰和对艺术水平要求较高的建筑物上，对材质的理解与应用是极其重要的。
Putin . it also foists a stark choice on the Kremlin : to stifle dissent , or to placate protesters to provide some kind of pressure outlet .它也给克里姆林宫提出了一个艰难的选择：是打击异见人士，还是安抚抗议者、给人们提供一些释放压力的出口。
he thinks washington will come to a resolution that , at some point , will placate markets .他认为，华盛顿将采取的解决办法是，在某种程度上安抚市场。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin placat- 'appeased', from the verb placare

entry.def: If you placate someone, you do or say something to make them stop feeling angry.

example.ex: He smiled, trying to placate me...
'I didn't mean to upset you,' Agnew said in a placating voice.
example.tran: 阿格纽用抚慰的语气说：“我不是有意让你不高兴。”

means.word_mean: 1. cause to be more favorably inclined; gain the good will of;

sentences.sentence: "She managed to mollify the angry customer"

auth_sentence.content: Something must be done to placate the rebellious Viennese.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Something must be done to placate the rebellious Viennese.

auth_sentence.content: They are convinced that he did it mainly to placate Barack Obama.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are convinced that he did it mainly to placate Barack Obama.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are convinced that he did it mainly to placate Barack Obama.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+plac平静+ent……的→全部平静→无进一步的要→自满的
com全部+plais=plac平静+ant……的→让[别人]平静舒服→讨好的
im不+placable易平静的→adj.难以满足的,难平息的
plac平静+able能……的→adj.易平息的,易和解的
plac平静+ebo表示药品→平静的药
